R

RangeFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the difference between highest and lowest pitches.
RangeFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RangeFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
RangeOfHighestLineFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the difference between the highest note and the lowest note played in the channel with the highest average pitch divided by the difference between the highest note and the lowest note in the piece.
RangeOfHighestLineFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RangeOfHighestLineFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
recording_length - Variable in class jsymbolic.processing.MIDIIntermediateRepresentations
The length in seconds of the recording
recording_list - Variable in class jsymbolic.gui.RecordingSelectorPanel
Holds references to files, associated meta-data and extracted features.
recording_selector_panel - Variable in class jsymbolic.gui.OuterFrame
A panel allowing the user to select files to extract features from.
RecordingInfo - Class in jsymbolic.datatypes
A class for holding references to MIDI recordings.
RecordingInfo(String, String, Sequence, boolean) - Constructor for class jsymbolic.datatypes.RecordingInfo
Basic constructor for filling fields.
RecordingInfo(String) - Constructor for class jsymbolic.datatypes.RecordingInfo
Basic constructor for filling fields.
RecordingSelectorPanel - Class in jsymbolic.gui
A window that allows users to select MIDI files to extract features from play.
RecordingSelectorPanel(OuterFrame) - Constructor for class jsymbolic.gui.RecordingSelectorPanel
Set up frame.
RecordingsTableModel - Class in jsymbolic.gui
A table model used by the RecordingSelectorPanel to store references to symbolic recordings.
RelativeNoteDensityOfHighestLineFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the number of Note Ons in the channel with the highest average pitch divided by the average number of Note Ons in all channels that contain at least one note.
RelativeNoteDensityOfHighestLineFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RelativeNoteDensityOfHighestLineFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
RelativeRangeOfLoudestVoiceFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the difference between the highest note and the lowest note played in the channel with the highest average loudness divided by the difference between the highest note and the lowest note overall in the piece.
RelativeRangeOfLoudestVoiceFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RelativeRangeOfLoudestVoiceFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
RelativeStrengthOfMostCommonIntervalsFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the fraction of melodic intervals that belong to the second most common interval divided by the fraction of melodic intervals belonging to the most common interval.
RelativeStrengthOfMostCommonIntervalsFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RelativeStrengthOfMostCommonIntervalsFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
RelativeStrengthOfTopPitchClassesFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the frequency of the 2nd most common pitch class divided by the frequency of the most common pitch class.
RelativeStrengthOfTopPitchClassesFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RelativeStrengthOfTopPitchClassesFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
RelativeStrengthOfTopPitchesFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the frequency of the 2nd most common pitch divided by the frequency of the most common pitch.
RelativeStrengthOfTopPitchesFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RelativeStrengthOfTopPitchesFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
RepeatedNotesFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the fraction of notes that are repeated melodically.
RepeatedNotesFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RepeatedNotesFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
rhythmic_histogram - Variable in class jsymbolic.processing.MIDIIntermediateRepresentations
A normalized histogram with bins corresponding to beats per minute.
rhythmic_histogram_table - Variable in class jsymbolic.processing.MIDIIntermediateRepresentations
Table with rows (first indice) corresponding to the bins of rhythmic_histogram.
RhythmicLoosenessFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the average width of beat histogram peaks (in beats per minute).
RhythmicLoosenessFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RhythmicLoosenessFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
RhythmicVariabilityFeature - Class in jsymbolic.features
A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the bin values (except the first 40 empty ones).
RhythmicVariabilityFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic.features.RhythmicVariabilityFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
